/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street bathed in the soft glow of a bright sun, which is positioned in the top left corner of the frame. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their facades adorned with numerous windows that reflect the sunlight. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, their colors muted against the stark concrete of the cityscape. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalks, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
